revised_title: The Leeuwenhoek Legacy: Microscopy and Microtechniques
tldr: This book review discusses Brian J. Ford's exploration of the legacy of Antonie van Leeuwenhoek, a Delft cloth worker who developed single-lens microscopes and made significant discoveries in microscopy and microtechniques. Ford examines Leeuwenhoek's microscopes and specimens, revealing their remarkable quality and resolution, and shares vivid images of Leeuwenhoek's achievements. The book highlights the skill and patience of Leeuwenhoek in developing everyday techniques that led to the discovery of bacteria.
